info.title: ByteBuddy API
info.description: A comprehensive ASP.NET Core Web API for ByteBuddy - A social platform for sharing code snippets, connecting with developers, and collaborative coding.

Bearer.description: Enter 'Bearer' followed by a space and your JWT token. Example: 'Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9...'
